directions: Finely chop cilantro and in a small bowl stir together with sour cream, lime juice, coriander seeds, and salt and pepper to taste. Arrange salmon on a platter and serve with cilantro cream and bread. Garnish salmon with lime halves.
ingredients: Accompaniment: slices of pumpernickel or whole-wheat bread
title: Smoked Salmon with Cilantro Cream
